long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description
Turns a single wikipedia page into dark mode.

Tutorial
To enable, click the icon and then click the giant button that says "Go Dark".

How does it work?
It turns the background to dark grey (#323232) and most of the other elements to white (#ffffff). Table backgrounds have been removed.

Troubleshooting
If you'd like to see any other changes or experience any issues, please provide a screenshot for me and I'll correct it and give you a shout-out in the change log.
